text.div:
Giardiasis (Tests for Giardia species Antigen)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    14210-9 Giardia lamblia Ag [Presence] in Stool by Immunofluorescence
